sections.about_desc: Welcome to FlowerLab Vlada ‚Äì the first studio in Chernivtsi that introduced giant bouquets and large signature compositions! We continuously grow, learn, and improve our craft. We expand our team, introduce new shapes, colors, and arrangements, explore global trends, and adapt them for our clients. Our studio also collaborates with various brands and venues, creating floral solutions for events, gifts, and visual decor. FlowerLab Vlada is quality, style, and service that inspire and leave a lasting impression.

reviews_data.name: Maria S.
reviews_data.text: I really like the bouquet and recommend this store. Everything was perfect!

reviews_data.name: Alex D.
reviews_data.text: Fresh flowers and fast delivery. Will order again for sure!

reviews_data.name: Elena K.
reviews_data.text: Beautiful packaging and very polite courier. Thank you!

reviews_data.name: Ivan P.
reviews_data.text: The roses stood for 2 weeks! Amazing quality.

reviews_data.name: Oksana M.
reviews_data.text: Best flower shop in Chernivtsi. Highly recommended!

intro.title: We are FlowerLab Vlada, a floral studio.
intro.desc: Our team creates premium bouquets and signature floral arrangements focused on quality, style, and emotion. With daily deliveries of fresh flowers, a wide selection, and attentive service, we've become a studio people trust in Chernivtsi.

about.title: ABOUT US
about.p1: Welcome to our flower shop ‚Äî a place where every bouquet tells a story. We believe that flowers are more than just a gift; they are a way to express emotions, share happiness, and make every moment memorable.
about.p2: Our team carefully selects fresh flowers every day to ensure the highest quality and beauty in every arrangement. Whether it‚Äôs a romantic gesture, a celebration, or just a small token of appreciation, we create bouquets that speak from the heart.
about.p3: We take pride in our attention to detail, creative designs, and friendly service. Each bouquet is handcrafted with love, tailored to fit your style and occasion.

seo.home_desc: Premium bouquets, fresh flowers, and gifts with delivery in Chernivtsi. Order online for best quality and service.

catalog.title: BOUQUETS
catalog.seo_desc: Browse our wide selection of fresh bouquets and floral arrangements. Filter by price, size, and occasion.
catalog.no_results_sub: Try changing filters or checking the spelling

about_page.title: ABOUT US
about_page.history: We are FlowerLab Vlada, a floral design studio. Our team creates premium bouquets and signature floral arrangements with a focus on quality, style, and emotion. Daily deliveries of fresh flowers, a wide selection, and caring service make us the studio people trust in Chernivtsi. We are the first in Ukraine to introduce the format of giant bouquets and large signature box compositions. This has become part of our unique style and brand identity. We continuously grow, learn, and improve our work. We expand our team, introduce new shapes, colors, and arrangements, explore global trends, and adapt them for our clients. Our studio also collaborates with various brands and venues, creating floral solutions for events, gifts, and visual decor. FlowerLab Vlada is quality, style, and service that inspire and leave a lasting impression.
